Articles.Content: Not sure if this was discussed before, but I would love to see a mission editor built into KSP2.   It would be super cool if actual scientists or engineers have the ability, on an ongoing basis, to design and describe actual experiments for KSP2, which could then become challenges for all players.  This could really extend the KSP2 importance as an educational tool.
This suggestion for the game's development has been moved to Development Discussions.
